DOC.brief_title: Study Psychosexual Impact Cancer-Related Infertility Women : Third Party Reproductive Assistance
DOC.detailed_description: As part study , ask fill series questionnaire . These question ask feeling , sexual function , quality life , idea reproductive option . We also ask question , health , medical history . You choose answer question either one doctor visit telephone . You decide best way complete assessment .
DOC.criteria: Study group gynecologic cancer survivor BMT/SMT cancer survivor : History primary diagnosis gynecologic cancer history primary malignancy treat BMT/SCT No evidence disease least one year At least 18 year age great 49 year age time study recruitment No cancer history Have impair fertility : lack uterus intact ovary lack ovary lack ovarian function base FSH determination intact uterus Have start complete childbearing Able willing provide inform consent Ability comprehend complete questionnaire English Comparison Group noncancer infertile woman await egg ( oocyte ) donation : No cancer history At least 18 year age great 49 year age time study recruitment In ovarian failure wait list egg ( oocyte ) donation Have start complete childbearing Able willing provide inform consent Ability comprehend complete questionnaire English Inability participate informed consent process Patients psychiatric disorder preclude response survey
